articles.description: The actress, 27, is known for her show-stopping red carpet looks but she was cruelly trolled after wearing a sheer gown at the Valentino fashion show in Rome in July.
articles.content:
Florence Pugh has hit back at cruel trolls who criticised her for going braless in a sheer Valentino gown, questioning how her 'nipples' could have 'offended' people.
